page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: UNEMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA IS WELL BELOW THE NATIONAL AVERAGE. MOST PEOPLE WORK AWAY FROM THE AREA IN NORTHAMPTON, LEICESTER AND SOME COMMUTE TO LONDON.THE SMALL BUSINESSES WHICH ARE IN THE VILLAGES DO NOT HAVE UNIONS . RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN EMPLOYER AND EMPLOYEE ARE VERY GOOD, WITH LITTLE OR NO DEMARCATION OF TRADES. A GOOD EXAMPLE OF THIS TAKES PLACE AT HOLDENBY WHERE THOSE VILLAGERS EMPLOYED BY THE ESTATE CAN ONE DAY BE DRIVING A TRACTOR AND THE NEXT TAKING MONEY AT THE GATE OF THE HOUSE. FARMERS IN THE AREA ALL BELONG TO THE NATIONAL FARMERS UNION WHICH LOOKS AFTER THEIR INTERESTS NATIONALLY. FODEN LEATHER COMPONENTS HAVE A FACTORY IN SPRATTON WHICH EMPLOYS APPROXIMATELY 40 PEOPLE. HIGHGATE HOUSE PROVIDES DOMESTIC WORK FOR A FEW LOCAL WOMEN.
